name: OR_LNLG_COUNTS_MISSNEEDLE
description: The OR_LNLG_COUNTS_MISSNEEDLE table contains information on whether there is a missing needle.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COUNT_MISSING_NEEDLE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value for whether there is a missing needle.
